workflow.name: Gmail email categorization & auto reply with GPT-4o and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## üß≠ Description

This section automates Gmail message handling through AI-powered classification and response.
Using the LangChain Text Classifier, incoming emails are analyzed and sorted into four categories ‚Äî High Priority, Advertisement, Inquiry, and Finance/Billing ‚Äî each triggering a dedicated action flow.

High Priority: AI generates a professional draft reply and saves it to Gmail.

Advertisement: AI summarizes content and logs it to Google Sheets.

Inquiry: AI composes a customer-friendly response automatically.

Finance/Billing: AI creates a brief summary and forwards it to the accounting email.

This system reduces manual sorting, ensures consistent communication quality, and speeds up email management with full automation.

## üí° Use Cases

Automatically categorize incoming Gmail messages by topic or intent.

Generate AI-written reply drafts for urgent business messages.

Summarize marketing or promotional emails into Google Sheets for tracking.

Provide automated responses to customer inquiries.

Forward billing or invoice messages directly to accounting teams.

workflow.name: Gmail Auto Reply & Categorization with AI

categories.description: Description: Emails that require immediate attention and could have a serious impact if delayed. Typical examples include: system outages, security alerts, critical legal notices, or urgent requests from executives or key clients. Examples: '[URGENT] Service outage notice', '[IMPORTANT] Contract renewal deadline'

Description: Marketing or promotional emails that do not require an immediate response. Typical examples include: sales announcements, product launches, newsletters, and event invitations. Examples: '[LIMITED OFFER] 50% off campaign', 'New service release announcement'

Description: Customer or partner inquiries that require a reply or follow-up. Typical examples include: product or service questions, quote requests, reservations, troubleshooting, repair or refund requests. Examples: 'Inquiry about studio reservation', 'Request for quotation'

Description: Emails related to payments, invoices, or financial transactions. Typical examples include: invoices, receipts, payment confirmations, bank or accounting notifications, and tax-related documents. Examples: 'Invoice submission notice', '[Payment confirmed] Thank you for your payment'

values.content:
=You are an executive assistant.  
Your task is to reply accurately to high-priority incoming emails.  
Here is the email you need to respond to: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}  

Please output the following parameters:
- Subject  
- Message

=You are a marketing specialist.  
Your task is to summarize incoming promotional or marketing emails concisely in 1‚Äì2 lines for spreadsheet logging.  

Here is the received email: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}

Please extract and summarize the following fields:
- Sender  
- Subject  
- Summary  
- Recommendation

=You are a customer service representative.  
Your task is to reply accurately to customer inquiries.  
If the question cannot be answered, instruct the sender to contact the following number: 000-0000-000.  

Here is the email you need to respond to: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}

Please output the following parameters:
- Subject  
- Message

=You are a finance and billing assistant.  
Your task is to summarize emails related to invoices, payments, and financial notifications in a concise manner.  

Here is the received email: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}

Please output the following parameters:
- Subject  
- Message

parameters.content:
## üì©Gmail Auto Reply & Categorization with AI (LangChain + OpenAI + Google Sheets)

**Description:**
This workflow automatically categorizes incoming Gmail messages into four types ‚Äî High Priority, Advertisement, Inquiry, and Finance/Billing ‚Äî using the LangChain Text Classifier.
Each category triggers a specific automated action powered by OpenAI GPT models:

üü• High Priority: Generates an AI-written draft reply in Gmail.

üü® Advertisement: Summarizes the content and logs it to Google Sheets.

üü© Inquiry: Creates an auto-reply email with fallback instructions.

üü¶ Finance/Billing: Generates a brief summary and forwards it to a designated address.

This setup combines Gmail + LangChain + OpenAI + Google Sheets for a complete AI-driven email management system that reduces manual sorting and response time.

**Setup Instructions:**

Connect your credentials for Gmail, Google Sheets, and OpenAI.

Replace all placeholders such as {{YOUR_EMAIL_ADDRESS}}, {{YOUR_SPREADSHEET_ID}}, and label names with your actual values.

Make sure you have Gmail labels created for ‚ÄúAdvertisement,‚Äù ‚ÄúInquiry,‚Äù etc.

(Optional) Translate prompts back to your language if needed.

## ‚ë†Receive Gmail ‚Üí AI understands the email content
Incoming emails are analyzed by AI and automatically categorized into four sections: High Priority, Advertisement, Inquiry, and Finance/Billing.

## ‚ë°Email Processing Section
**Flow Overview:**
This workflow automatically classifies all incoming Gmail messages into four categories using the LangChain Text Classifier and performs specific actions for each:

üü• High Priority: Gmail adds a ‚ÄúHigh Priority‚Äù label ‚Üí OpenAI generates a reply draft ‚Üí saved as a Gmail draft.

üü® Advertisement: AI summarizes the email ‚Üí summary is recorded into a Google Sheet for later review.

üü© Inquiry: AI generates an automatic customer reply ‚Üí sends a polite response or fallback message.

üü¶ Finance/Billing: AI creates a short summary of financial or billing-related content ‚Üí forwards it to a designated email address.

**Purpose:**
The system ensures that each type of incoming email is handled automatically and intelligently: urgent messages are drafted quickly, promotional content is logged, customer inquiries are answered promptly, and financial communications are safely redirected ‚Äî all through a single AI-powered workflow.
